definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: The boy was barbarously murdered by the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 這個少年被敵人慘殺了。

sentences.english: Who was the first organization to act against this killing?
sentences.chinese: 是哪個組織首先對這場慘殺進行反擊。
